{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Aerohive |model=AP650 |revision=X |series=AX3500 |price=1400 |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |type=enterprise access point |fcc_id=WBV-AP650X |fcc_date=08/29/2018 |ic_id=7774A-AP650X |flags=Bluetooth 4.1 LE, MU-MIMO, 1024QAM, DFS (master), HE160, |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM49408;BCM49408KFEBG; |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16TW-107 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43684 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac+ax |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43684 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ax |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=2.5G |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ax }}
:• 1x '''1148''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ax 802.11ax] (40MHz chan.) + :• 1x '''2400''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ax 802.11ax] (80MHz chan.) = '''''AX3500'' class''' or :• 2x '''2400''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ax 802.11ax] (80MHz chan.) = '''''AX4800'' class'''
{{TagLine|802.11ax Enterprise Access Points}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.aerohive.com/technology/80211ax/}} *4×4 + 4×4 802.11ax radios *2x Ethernet ports (2.5G and 1G) *USB, Bluetooth low energy *Software definable radio (Dual 5GHz) *Powered by PoE+ or DC power *8 external antennas It appears to be possible to configure the second radio for either :2.4GHz or 5GHz operation. Some sort of Broadcom chip appears to drive the 2.5 GbE port. ===News=== *[https://blog.aerohive.com/aerohive-announces-three-802-11ax-access-points/ ''Aerohive announces three 802.11ax access points'' on '''Aerohive''' blog] *[https://wifinowevents.com/news-and-blog/aerohive-announces-release-802-11ax-ap-family/ ''Aerohive announces release of 802.11ax AP family'' on '''Wi-Fi Now'''] :^ Source of Broadcom chip guess ===See also=== :[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] *[[Aerohive AP630]] *[[Aerohive AP650]] *[[Aerohive AP650X]] __NOTOC__
